title: DrDapper's Author Page

[[include component:image-block | name=	http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/drdapper-author-page-sandbox/scpauthorpageart2.png | caption=SCP-████ playing on his phone during lunch at Site-17 | width=300]]

**Item #:** SCP-████

**Object Class:** Safe? Keter? Safe.

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-████ is to remain at Site-17 with Class-IV privileges. For the sake of containment, he is not to be severely reprimanded in any way regardless of uncooperativeness. While minor reprimands are fine, such as putting a timer on his --Xbox-- --Playstation-- --Xbox-- computer, major reprimands that will urge SCP-████ to leave Foundation custody are to be avoided.

Due to the nature of SCP-████, absolute containment is not possible. SCP-████ has expressed a desire to "live" at Site-17 permanently, but in the event SCP-████ leaves Site-17, he is to be lured back with promises of the following:

* Steam gift cards
* --A gallon of whole milk--[[footnote]] No longer applicable after SCP-███ was put on a dairy-free diet [[/footnote]]
* Internet that doesn't shit the bed every 20 minutes
* An offer to join Alpha-9 on a mission[[footnote]] SCP-████'s Alpha-9 application has been denied 32 times. However, allowing SCP-████ to tag along purely as an observer //should// be fine [[/footnote]]
* A trip to Freddy Fazbear's Pizza
* Free art commissions
* FGO rolls
* --A date with █████--[[footnote]] Impossible following the collapse of the gateway to Universe-61/205 [[/footnote]]

**Description:** SCP-████ is a 4ft flat humanoid entity. He has a blocky body structure, and his skin is a red pigment. Many have pointed out similarities between him and the main character from the video game "████ ████".

Aside from its appearance, SCP-████'s anomalous properties comes from that fact that he can essentially will anything he wants into happening. The difference between SCP-████ and, say, [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-239 SCP-239], is that SCP-████ seems to be completely unaware of his powers. As such, he perceives anything he causes as merely a convenient coincidence.

For example, SCP-████ unlocking all doors and deactivating all security measures when he feels like leaving the site. He is unaware that these security failures were caused by him, instead believing that said security measures simply did not exist.

There are limits to his abilities, however. Notably, the ability to teleport, travel dimensions, avoid death[[footnote]] SCP-████ has died before, usually in ridiculous and humorous ways. However, he always just reappears in his bedroom shortly after dying, claiming to not remember the death [[/footnote]], not get sick when the weather first gets cold in September/October, consume dairy, micro in HoI4, or find love.

**Addendum-████-1:**  On May 24th, 2021, SCP-████ was spotted writing in a notebook labeled "Works By [[*user DrDapper]]." When asked, SCP-████ claimed it was "where he kept all his stories." Attempts were made to confiscate the notebook, but was prevented thanks to SCP-████'s anomalous properties. He did, however, offer to share the contents of the notebook with the Foundation, stating that "getting people to see Tales is impossible. Anything to help increase traffic."

Below are hyperlinks to everything found within "Works By [[*user DrDapper]]."

[[tab Tales (21)]]
+ ##white|Tales##

------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-scottish-goliath The Scottish Goliath]**
//"I'm assuming it has something to do with the new recruits." Albany said in his thick Scottish accent.//

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-minutemen The Minutemen]**
//The three of them jumped to their feet and saluted the commander.//

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/brink-of-hysteria Brink of Hysteria]**
//He blinked rapidly and moved his eyes to let her know he was, in fact, not dead.//

------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/beyond-the-depths-part1 Beyond The Depths: Asset, Not Agent]**
//"Is that a fucking kid?" Milo said into his ear.//

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/beyond-the-depths-part2 Beyond The Depths: Foreigners]**
//"Apologies. As I'm sure you've been able to conclude, you and your colleague do not belong here."//

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/beyond-the-depths-part3 Beyond The Depths: In A Flash]**
//This wasn't the first time she had that nightmare, and it wouldn't be the last.//

**[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/beyond-the-depths-part4 Beyond The Depths: For The Present]**
//The young girl was crying and gasping and whimpering in pain.//

**[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/beyond-the-depths-part5 Beyond The Depths: It's A Long Way To Go]**
//Iris's lip quivered, then she dropped to her knees and broke down sobbing.//

**[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/beyond-the-depths-part6 Beyond The Depths: Knife Edge]**
//Concentrating, she pushed the knife into the polaroid.//

------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/we-concerned-few We Concerned Few]**
//"If this is an inside job, I want to know who so I can personally shoot that son of a bitch in the head."//

------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/17-phoenix-street 17 Phoenix Street]**
//Thompson waved her hand. "I'm an excellent multi-tasker. Now come, let's sit and discuss what it is you require of me."//

------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/bright-sunny-south-part-1 Bright Sunny South - Part 1]**[[footnote]] ##red|Content Warning: Themes of hate## [[/footnote]]
//She didn't jump or jolt or gasp or anything associated with waking up from the worst nightmare you had ever experienced. And yet, as Milo slowly sat up in her bed, it was impossible to keep her hands and arms from trembling.//

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/bright-sunny-south-part-2 Bright Sunny South - Part 2]**[[footnote]] ##red|Content Warning: Themes of hate, use of the N-slur## [[/footnote]]
//"Ralph please." Sheriff was begging now. "This is her only option left. The circumstances are convoluted. She isn't bad, just… in the wrong place at the wrong time."//

------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/beige-folder The Beige Folder]**
//Cornwall opened the folder and began reading it. His face kept a neutral expression, a result of him spending years as a detective, but Parker could see the horror in his eyes.//

------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/7-levels-of-17 7 Levels of Site-17]**
//Dantensen let out a quick laugh. "Funny. You're the fourth person this week to be concerned with inmate education."//

------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/swimming-lessons Swimming Lessons]**
//"I told you I had a plan." Foxx responded, pointing towards the red 10 foot marker painted on the side of the pool.//

------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/haunting-at-17 A Haunting At Site-17]**
//But before Tom could react, a thin, black hand shot out of the computer monitor and grabbed his throat.//

------

//"A… a birthday party?" Iris stuttered, feeling her face go warm. "For me?"//

//I was rather taken aback by this suggestion. While Thompson seemed more than capable of handling herself, there was still the threat of a werewolf on the premise.//

//Decided to turn on the TV while I ate. Big mistake. First thing I saw was a news headline about a group of skips found dead on the side of the road.//

//"So which O5 member do I have the pleasure of conversing with this time?" D.C. al Fine asked the second the blue wave line, representing Fine's voice, appeared on screen.//

[[tab Contact]]
+ ##white|Contact##

------

[[div class="blockquote"]]
"There are many ways to get into contact with me. The easiest and most convenient will be through Wikidot PMs. My DMs are also always open on [https://twitter.com/DrDapperTF2 Twitter], [https://discord.com/channels/@me/472222098090098688 Discord], and (if you're really desperate) [https://steamcommunity.com/id/drdappertf2/ Steam].

I usually respond within 12 hours of contact, though it may take longer depending on how life is going. Unfortunately, more personal info such as my phone number and personal email aren't know by anyone on the Wiki (including wiki friends). If I don't respond to any of what's listed above, then consider me unreachable."

(PS: If you do contact me, PLEASE don’t just send me a DM message saying “hey” or “can I talk you to.” Let me know you’re reaching me from the Wiki, other wise I’m just going to assume you’re a scammer and block you.)
[[/div]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab Will]]
+ ##white|Will##

------

[[div class="blockquote"]]
"In the event I, [[*user DrDapper]], end up dead, banned, or publicly announce I quit writing for the Wiki, ownership of all of my works go directly to [[*user GlassAutomaton]]. The exception to this being any co-authored works, in which ownership will default to the other author, or any works where I specify otherwise."
[[/div]]
